name: Mid-Life Crisis Simulator
description:
Created by SilentHubba, Swimdoctor, and PrinceofJ

Welcome to midlife crisis simulator. You are William, a guy who just graduated college and is struggling with stress. Your goal is to get a date for Valentines day, one month from the start of the game. You get 4 actions per day. Once you get a date, your goal is to manage all of your bars until valentine's day.

LD47 Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/mid-life-crisis

Note: WebGL Version was added 40 minutes after the deadline, during the extra hour for porting
Note2: WebGL Version readded 7 hours after deadline due to it not working
Note3: WebGL still the wrong aspect ratio, rebuilt to itch the next morning
